blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers Requested by: Jessica Drew Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers
Requested by: Jessica Drew

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone. Modern communication seems to have come to an end. What remains is radiowaves. People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

summary: Top 11 Most Anticipated Films - First Half of 2019
title: Top 11 Most Anticipated Films - First Half of 2019
body:
It’s shaping up to be another amazing year in film! I anticipate that Captain Marvel and Avengers: Endgame will blow the doors off in the first half of 2019, setting up the MCU for even bigger and better things in the future. I’m also super excited for Happy Death Day 2U and the new Jordon Peele horror film Us. I absolutely love Happy Death Day and Get Out, so I can’t wait to see what these filmmakers do next! Honorable mentions: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part, Rocketman, Replicas, and Escape Room.

Most Anticipated Films | 2018: First Half / Second Half
Most Anticipated Films | 2019: First Half / Second Half

1. Avengers: End Game (April 26th)

2. Captain Marvel (March 8th)

3. Happy Death Day 2U (February 14th)

4. Us (March 15th)

5. John Wick: Chapter 3 (May 17th)

6. Aladdin (May 24th)

7. How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World (February 22nd)

8. Shazam! (April 5th)

9. The Secret Life of Pets 2 (June 7th)

10. Men in Black International (June 14th) 

11. Pokémon Detective Pikachu (May 10th)

summary: MCU CosmicCast Episode 40 #Avengers4Alexander is a Success and Captain Marvel's Big Week
title: MCU CosmicCast Episode 40 #Avengers4Alexander is a Success and Captain Marvel's Big Week
body:
Welcome to Episode 40 of the MCU CosmicCast. This week Jeremy talks about how fans help make #Avengers4Alexander a success, Captain Marvel‘s big week of ticket pre-sales, how Captain Marvel can bring new fans to the MCU, new Disney+ rumors, and there were some Avengers: Endgame toy leaks this week that confirmed previous promo art leaks.

This week’s links:

  • #Avengers4Alexander Was a Success!
  • Capt…

summary:
I kept looking at this Captain Marvel poster, trying to figure out why it looked so familiar
And then I realized. I've seen this...
body:
I kept looking at this Captain Marvel poster, trying to figure out why it looked so familiar

And then I realized. I’ve seen this before. On Soviet propaganda posters for their space program. LOL Interesting artistic choice

reblog.comment:
I kept looking at this Captain Marvel poster, trying to figure out why it looked so familiar

And then I realized. I’ve seen this before. On Soviet propaganda posters for their space program. LOL Interesting artistic choice

summary: Captain Marvel: Ronan ed il suo ruolo nella pellicola
title: Captain Marvel: Ronan ed il suo ruolo nella pellicola
body:
Captain Marvel: Ronan ed il suo ruolo nella pellicola

Sembra che in Captain Marvel vedremo una versione più contenuta di Ronan l’Accusatore, stando almeno a quanto detto da uno dei produttori del film.

Durante una breve intervista con Comicbook, il produttore esecutivo di Capitan Marvel, Jonathan Schwartz, ha parlato un po’ del personaggio nel film in uscita. Secondo il produttore, Ronan sarebbe una versione meno radicale del personaggio che…
